description: This file serves as a wrapper for logging functionality, importing an external logging module and defining a factory function 'Create' for initializing log objects with specific parameters.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Factory function to create and configure a Log object from the external logging module.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
